>
[Cantorian Reinforcement](/Feats.aspx?ID=5569) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), you get a critical success instead. If you have a different ability that would improve the save in this way (such as the [battle hardened fighter class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=7)), if you roll a critical failure on the save you get a failure instead.
name: Cantorian Reinforcement
